gene.function: FUNCTION: Involved in the retrieval of endoplasmic reticulum membrane proteins from the early Golgi compartment. {ECO:0000250}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Golgi apparatus membrane; Multi-pass membrane protein.
